meanings.definition: A narrative that relates details or facts.
meanings.sent1: Grandma told us exciting tales about her childhood adventures.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading fairy tales to my little sister before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The cat spun tales of chasing mice bigger than elephants.
meanings.sent4: Her tales of bravery in the face of danger inspired us all.
meanings.sent5: The tales of the ancient kingdom were passed down through generations.

meanings.sent1: The children giggled at the silly tales of talking animals.
meanings.sent2: The book was filled with fantastical tales of dragons and wizards.
meanings.sent3: His tall tales about meeting aliens always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The movie director weaved a captivating tale of love and betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The campfire tales of ghosts and goblins kept us on the edge of our seats.

meanings.sent1: Telling tales will only lead to trouble in the end.
meanings.sent2: She knew it was wrong to spread false tales about her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous boy got caught in his web of lies and tales.
meanings.sent4: His tales of being a secret agent were quickly debunked by his friends.
meanings.sent5: The rumors were just malicious tales meant to harm her reputation.
